item.create.chest_minecart_contraption: Engenhoca com Carrinho de mina com baú
item.create.furnace_minecart_contraption: Engenhoca de Carrinho de mina com Fornalha
advancement.create.root.desc: É hora de começar a montar algumas Engenhocas magnificas!
advancement.create.andesite_alloy.desc: Materiais em Create tem nomes estranhos, Liga de Andesito é um desses.
advancement.create.its_alive.desc: Veja o seu primeiro componente cinético rodar.
advancement.create.shifting_gears.desc: Conectar uma Engrenagem Grande numa Engrenagem Pequena, mudando a velocidade da sua engenhoca.
advancement.create.overstressed.desc: Experimente os limites do estresse em primeira mão.
advancement.create.belt.desc: Conecte dois eixos usando uma Esteira Mecânica.
advancement.create.tunnel.desc: Embeleze sua Esteira Mecânica com um Túnel.
advancement.create.splitter_tunnel.desc: Crie um separador com um grupo de Túneis de Bronze.
advancement.create.chute.desc: Coloque uma calha, a contraparte vertical da Esteira.
advancement.create.upward_chute.desc: Veja um item lançado voar de uma calha movido por um ventilador.
advancement.create.belt_funnel.desc: Coloque um funil de lado em uma esteira ou depósito para criar um tipo especial.
advancement.create.fan.desc: Passeie em uma corrente de ar de de um Ventilador.
advancement.create.fan_lava.desc: Pego em uma corrente de ar que derrete coisas.
advancement.create.fan_water.desc: Pego em uma corrente de ar que lava coisas.
advancement.create.fan_smoke.desc: Pego em uma correte de ar que defuma itens.
advancement.create.wrench.desc: Crie uma Chave Inglesa para te ajudar a construir engenhocas.
advancement.create.goggles.desc: Crie Óculos de Engenheiro para te ajudar a coletar informações cinéticas dos componentes.
advancement.create.speedometer.desc: Coloque e ligue um Velocímetro. Olhe para ele com seus óculos para ler seu valor exato.
advancement.create.stressometer.desc: Coloque e ligue um Estressômetro. Olhe para ele com seus óculos para ler seu valor exato.
advancement.create.aesthetics.desc: Coloque suportes em um eixo, cano ou engrenagem.
advancement.create.reinforced.desc: Use reforços em eixos, canos ou esteira mecânica.
advancement.create.water_wheel.desc: Coloque uma Roda d'água e tente fazê-la girar!
advancement.create.chocolate_wheel.desc: Use chocolate derretido para mover uma Roda d'água.
advancement.create.cuckoo.desc: Veja um relógio cuco avisar que é hora de dormir.
advancement.create.millstone.desc: Coloque e ligue uma Pedra de moer.
advancement.create.maxed_windmill.desc: Monte um moinho de vento na força máxima.
advancement.create.andesite_casing.desc: Use Liga de Andesito e Madeira para criar um Revestimento básico.
advancement.create.mechanical_drill.desc: Coloque e ligue um Furadeira Mecânica.
advancement.create.press.desc: Ligue uma Prensa Mecânica e crie Chapas com ela.
Use uma Lixa para polir um Quartzo Rosa até ficar transparente.
advancement.create.electron_tube.desc: Fabrique alguns Tubos de Elétron, útil para criar maquinas menos primitivas.
advancement.create.mechanical_saw.desc: Coloque e ligue uma Serra Mecânica.
advancement.create.basin.desc: Coloque uma Bacia e tente jogar itens nela.
advancement.create.mixer.desc: Coloque um Mixer Mecânico sobre uma Bacia, ligue ela, e comece a misturas alguns ingredientes.
advancement.create.compact.desc: Use uma Prensa e uma Bacia para compactar alguns itens.
advancement.create.brass.desc: Use Cobre Moído e Zinco Moído para criar Bronze.
advancement.create.brass_casing.desc: Use o Bronze que acabou de obter e Madeira para criar Revestimentos Avançados.
advancement.create.copper_casing.desc: Use Chapas de Cobre e Madeira para criar Revestimentos de Cobre.
advancement.create.spout.desc: Veja um um contêiner de liquido ser preenchido com um Esguicho.
advancement.create.spout_potion.desc: Veja um Esguicho encher um frasco com uma poção.
advancement.create.chocolate.desc: Consiga um balde de Chocolate derretido.
advancement.create.item_drain.desc: Veja um contêiner de fluidos ser esvaziado por Dreno de Itens.
advancement.create.chained_item_drain.de: Veja um item rolar por vários drenos encadeados.
advancement.create.glass_pipe.desc: Veja um fluido ser propagado por um cano com janela. Canos comuns podem ser convertidos em "com janela" usando a Chave Inglesa neles.
advancement.create.pipe_collision.desc: Veja dois líquidos se encontrarem no seu encanamento.
advancement.create.pipe_spill.desc: Veja um cano aberto espirar ou sugar líquidos no mundo.
advancement.create.hose_pulley.desc: Desça uma Mangueira e veja ela sugar ou preencher uma poça de líquidos.
advancement.create.infinite_water.desc: Bombeie de um poça de Água tão grande que possa ser considerado Infinito.
advancement.create.infinite_lava.desc: Bombeie de uma poça de Lava tão grande que possa ser considerado Infinito.
advancement.create.infinite_chocolate.de: Bombeie de uma poça de Chocolate derretido tão grande que possa ser considerado Infinito.
advancement.create.crafter.desc: Coloque e ligue um Fabricador Mecânicos.
advancement.create.clockwork_bearing.des: Fabrique uma Estrutura montada em um Rolamento de Relógio.
advancement.create.nixie_tube.desc: Consiga e coloque um par de Tubos de Nixie.
advancement.create.deployer.desc: Coloque e ligue um Implantador, o reflexo perfeito de você mesmo.
advancement.create.speed_controller.desc: Coloque um Controle de Velocidade de Rotação, o mecanismo perfeito para mudar marchas.
advancement.create.flywheel.desc: Conecte com sucesso um motor ao Volante.
advancement.create.mechanical_arm.desc: Fabrique um Braço Mecânico, selecione entradas e saídas, posicione e ligue-o; então assista enquanto ele faz todo o trabalho para você.
advancement.create.musical_arm.desc: Veja um Braço Mecânico operar seu Toca-discos.
advancement.create.arm_many_targets.desc: Programe um Braço Mecânico com dez ou mais destinos.
advancement.create.arm_blaze_burner.desc: Instrua um Braço Mecânico a alimentar um Maçarico de Blaze.
advancement.create.crushing_wheel.desc: Crie alguma Rodas de Moer para quebrar materiais mais efetivamente.
advancement.create.blaze_cake.desc: Faça um bolo especial para o seu maçarico de blaze.
advancement.create.chromatic_compound.de: Crie uma Barra de Composto Cromático.
advancement.create.shadow_steel.desc: Crie Aço Sombrio, uma barra de metal feita de nada.
advancement.create.refined_radiance.desc: Crie Brilho Refinado, uma poderosa substancia cromática.
advancement.create.chromatic_age.desc: Crie revestimentos de luz e sombra.
advancement.create.zapper.desc: Fabrique um Blocozapper. Uma arma a lazer radiante que te ajuda a construir.
advancement.create.upgraded_zapper.desc: Crie e ative um Blocozapper totalmente melhorado.
advancement.create.deforester.desc: Fabrique um Desmatador, e dia adeus a floresta local.
advancement.create.dual_extendo_grip.des: Um Extensor de Punhos por mão para ter alcance sobre humano.
advancement.create.eob.desc: Espere mais conteúdo aqui no futuro. <3
death.attack.create.crush: %1$s foi processado pelas Rodas de Moer
death.attack.create.fan_lava: %1$s foi queimado pelo ventilador de lava
death.attack.create.mechanical_saw: %1$s cortado no meio por uma Serra Mecânica
death.attack.create.cuckoo_clock_explosi: %1$s foi explodido por um relógio cuco alterado
create.block.cart_assembler.invalid: Coloque o seu Montador de Carrinho em um trilho
create.recipe.automatic_shapeless: Fabricação de Receita sem Forma Automatizada
create.recipe.automatic_shaped: Fabricação de Receita com Forma Automatizada
create.keyinfo.scrollup: Simula Rolar mouse para Cima (no mundo)
create.keyinfo.scrolldown: Simula Rolar mouse para Baixo (no mundo)
create.gui.blockzapper.title: Blocozapper Portátil
create.gui.terrainzapper.title: Terraformador Portátil
create.blockzapper.leftClickToSet: Botão-Esquerdo em um Bloco para selecionar Material
create.minecart_coupling.two_couplings_m: Carrinhos de mina não podem ter mais de dois acoplamentos cada
create.minecart_coupling.unloaded: Partes do seu trem parecem estar em "Pedaços" não carregados
create.minecart_coupling.no_loops: Acoplamentos não podem formar um ciclo
create.minecart_coupling.removed: Todos os acoplamentos foram removidos do carrinho de mina
create.minecart_coupling.too_far: Carrinhos de mina estão muito separados
create.contraptions.movement_mode.rotate: Apenas Coloque próximo ao Angulo Inicial
create.contraptions.cart_movement_mode.r: Sempre olhe na direção do movimento
create.logistics.filter.apply_click_agai: Filtro aplicado em %1$s, clique novamente para copiar o montante.
create.logistics.filter.apply_count: Contagem de extração aplicada ao filtro.
create.gui.speedometer.title: Velocidade Rotação
create.gui.stressometer.title: Estresse da Rede
create.gui.contraptions.not_fast_enough: Parece que esse %1$s _não_ esta rodando com _velocidade_ _suficiente_.
create.gui.contraptions.network_overstre: Parece que essa engenhoca esta _sobrecarregada_. Adicione mais fontes ou _desacelere_ os componentes com alto _impacto_ no _estresse_.
create.gui.adjustable_crate.title: adjustable_crate
create.gui.stockpile_switch.title: Disjuntor de Armazenamento
create.gui.sequenced_gearshift.title: Transmissão Sequenciada
create.schematicAndQuill.noTarget: Seguro [Ctrl] para selecionar Blocos de Ar.
create.schematicAndQuill.title: Nome do Esquema:
create.schematic.invalid: [!] Item Inválido - Use a Mesa de Desenho no lugar
create.schematic.tool.deploy.description: Segure [Ctrl] para selecionar em uma distância fixa.
create.schematic.tool.move.description.1: Aponte ao Esquema e [CTRL]-Rolar para empurrar.
create.schematic.tool.rotate.description: Roda o Esquema em torno do seu centro.
Esta ferramenta é para o Modo Criativo apenas.
create.schematic.tool.flip.description.0: Gira o Esquema ao longo da face que você selecionar.
create.schematic.tool.flip.description.1: Aponte para o Esquema e [CTRL]-Rolar para virá-lo.
create.schematics.maxAllowedSize: O tamanho máximo permitido para o esquema é:
create.gui.schematicTable.title: Mesa de Desenho
create.gui.schematicannon.title: Esquemacannon
create.gui.schematicannon.slot.gunpowder: Adicione pólvora para abastecer o canhão
create.gui.schematicannon.slot.listPrint: Coloque livros arquivo para imprimir uma Lista de Controle para seu Esquema
create.gui.schematicannon.slot.schematic: Adicione seu Esquema aqui. Tenha certeza que vai ser criado na posição especificada.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.skipMis: Se o Esquemacannon não encontrar o Bloco para colocar, ele irá continuar para a próx. Posição.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.skipTil: O Esquemacannon vai evitar substituir blocos que contêm dados como Baus.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.dontRep: O canhão irá nunca substituir Blocos sólidos na área em trabalho, apenas não-Sólidos e Ar.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.replace: O canhão irá apenas substituir Blocos sólidos na área de trabalho, se o Esquema conter um bloco Sólido naquela posição.
O canhão irá substituir Blocos sólidos na área de trabalho, se o Esquema conter qualquer Bloco naquela posição.
O canhão irá limpar todos os blocos na área de trabalho, incluindo os substituídos por Ar.
create.materialChecklist.blocksNotLoaded:
* Aviso * 

Lista de Materiais pode não estar completa por Pedaços relevantes do Mundo não estarem carregados.
create.gui.filter.deny_list.description: Itens passam se eles NÃO baterem com os acima. Uma Lista-Bloqueados vazia aceita tudo.
create.gui.filter.allow_list.description: Itens passam se eles baterem com os acima. Uma List-Permitidos vazia rejeita tudo.
create.gui.filter.respect_data.descripti: Itens apenas batem se a durabilidade, encantamentos, e outros atributos baterem também.
create.item_attributes.has_name.inverted: UNLOCALIZED: does not have the custom name %1$s
create.item_attributes.book_copy_first.i: UNLOCALIZED: is not a first-generation copy
UNLOCALIZED: is not a second-generation copy
create.item_attributes.book_copy_tattere: UNLOCALIZED: is not a tattered mess
create.item_attributes.astralsorcery_cry: UNLOCALIZED: does not have crystal attribute %1$s
create.item_attributes.astralsorcery_per: UNLOCALIZED: does not have perk attribute %1$s
create.gui.attribute_filter.add_inverted: UNLOCALIZED: Add opposite attribute to List
create.gui.attribute_filter.allow_list_d: UNLOCALIZED: Items pass if they have any of the selected attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.allow_list_c: UNLOCALIZED: Items pass only if they have ALL of the selected attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.deny_list.de: UNLOCALIZED: Items pass if they do NOT have any of the selected attributes.
create.mechanical_arm.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Braço Mecânico has %1$s input(s) and %2$s output(s).
create.mechanical_arm.points_outside_ran: UNLOCALIZED: %1$s selected interaction point(s) removed due to range limitations.
create.hint.hose_pulley.title: UNLOCALIZED: Bottomless Supply
create.hint.hose_pulley: UNLOCALIZED: The targeted body of fluid is considered infinite.
create.hint.mechanical_arm_no_targets: UNLOCALIZED: It appears this _Mechanical_ _Arm_ has not been assigned any _targets._ Select belts, depots, funnels and other blocks by _right-clicking_ them while _holding_ the _Mechanical_ _Arm_ in your _hand_.
create.hint.horizontal_funnel.title: UNLOCALIZED: Horizontal Funils
create.hint.horizontal_funnel: UNLOCALIZED: cannot transfer between inventories _directly_. Try running a _Mechanical_ _Esteira_ or _Depósito_ below your funnel to extract items from Inventories.
create.hint.upward_funnel.title: UNLOCALIZED: Funils facing upward
create.hint.upward_funnel: UNLOCALIZED: can only transfer items inserted by _Arms_, fan-powered _Calhas_, or items _thrown_ at them. Try building some _Calhas_ if you are looking to move your items _vertically_.
create.hint.empty_bearing.title: UNLOCALIZED: Update Bearing
create.hint.empty_bearing: UNLOCALIZED: _Right-click_ the bearing with an _empty_ _hand_ to _attach_ the structure you just built in front of it.
create.hint.full_deployer.title: UNLOCALIZED: Deployer Item Overflow
create.hint.full_deployer: UNLOCALIZED: It appears this _Deployer_ contains _excess_ _items_ that need to be _extracted._ Use a _hopper,_ _funnel_ or other means to free it from its overflow.
create.gui.config.overlay2: UNLOCALIZED: This is a sample overlay
create.gui.config.overlay3: UNLOCALIZED: Click or drag with your mouse
create.gui.config.overlay5: UNLOCALIZED: Press ESC to exit this screen
create.gui.config.overlay6: UNLOCALIZED: and save the new position
create.gui.config.overlay8: UNLOCALIZED: to reset to the default position
create.command.killTPSCommand.status.slo: UNLOCALIZED: [Create]: Server tick is currently slowed by %s ms :o
UNLOCALIZED: [Create]: Server tick is slowed by %s ms now >:)
UNLOCALIZED: [Create]: Server tick is back to regular speed :D
create.command.killTPSCommand.status.usa: UNLOCALIZED: [Create]: use /killtps stop to bring back server tick to regular speed
UNLOCALIZED: [Create]: use /killtps start <tickTime> to artificially slow down the server tick
item.create.example_item.tooltip: EXAMPLE ITEM (just a marker that this tooltip exists)
item.create.example_item.tooltip.summary: A brief description of the item. _Underscores_ highlight a term.
item.create.example_item.tooltip.behavio: Then this item does this. (behaviours show on shift)
You can add as many behaviours as you like
block.create.andesite_encased_shaft.tool: UNLOCALIZED: _Creative only_ item. Encase shafts _in-world_ using _Revestimento Andesito_. Revestimento blocks will not be consumed.
block.create.brass_encased_shaft.tooltip: UNLOCALIZED: _Creative only_ item. Encase shafts _in-world_ using _Bronze Revestimento_. Casing blocks will not be consumed.
block.create.wooden_bracket.tooltip.summ: UNLOCALIZED: _Decorate_ your _Eixos, Cogwheels_ and _Pipes_ with a cozy and wooden bit of reinforcement.
block.create.metal_bracket.tooltip.summa: UNLOCALIZED: _Decorate_ your _Eixos, Cogwheels_ and _Pipes_ with an industrial and sturdy bit of reinforcement.
block.create.andesite_casing.tooltip.sum: UNLOCALIZED: Simple machine casing with a variety of uses. Safe for decoration. Can be used to _encase Eixos_ and _Esteira Mecânicas._
block.create.andesite_funnel.tooltip.sum: UNLOCALIZED: A general item transfer component, transitioning items between means of transportation. Can be controlled with a _redstone signal_.
block.create.andesite_funnel.tooltip.beh: UNLOCALIZED: The _open face_ will _collect ground items_ in the block space in front of it and _insert_ them into any container on the opposite side of the funnel.
block.create.andesite_funnel.tooltip.con: UNLOCALIZED: When mounted on belts, depots and similar
block.create.andesite_funnel.tooltip.beh: UNLOCALIZED: _Collects_ or _Places_ items onto the mounted component, from or to the _inventory behind_ itself. Whenever the funnel has specific directionality, it pode ser reversed using a Chave Inglesa.
block.create.andesite_funnel.tooltip.con: UNLOCALIZED: When vertically between two inventories
block.create.andesite_funnel.tooltip.beh: UNLOCALIZED: Will _transfer_ items _downward_, much like a buffer-less hopper.
block.create.andesite_tunnel.tooltip.sum: UNLOCALIZED: A protective cover for your _Mechanical_ _Esteiras!_ _Andesito Túnels_ can split off one item from a stack when another belt or depot is placed at the side of the main belt.
block.create.andesite_tunnel.tooltip.con: UNLOCALIZED: R-Click with Chave Inglesa on Side
block.create.andesite_tunnel.tooltip.act: UNLOCALIZED: _Adjusts window shutters_ if the tunnel has a window on that face.
block.create.brass_funnel.tooltip.summar: UNLOCALIZED: A general item transfer component, transitioning items between means of transportation. Can be controlled with a _redstone signal_. Comes with a handy _filter_.
block.create.brass_funnel.tooltip.behavi: UNLOCALIZED: The _open face_ will _collect ground items_ in the block space in front of it and _insert_ them into any container on the opposite side of the funnel.
block.create.brass_funnel.tooltip.condit: UNLOCALIZED: When mounted on belts, depots and similar
block.create.brass_funnel.tooltip.behavi: UNLOCALIZED: _Collects_ or _Places_ items onto the mounted component, from or to the _inventory behind_ itself. Whenever the funnel has specific directionality, it pode ser reversed using a Chave Inglesa.
block.create.brass_funnel.tooltip.condit: UNLOCALIZED: When vertically between two inventories
block.create.brass_funnel.tooltip.behavi: UNLOCALIZED: Will _transfer_ items _downward_, much like a buffer-less hopper.
block.create.brass_tunnel.tooltip.summar: UNLOCALIZED: A fancy protective cover for your _Mechanical_ _Esteiras!_ _Túneis de Bronze_ also come with a number of _Filtering_ and _Splitting_ options for your items.
block.create.brass_tunnel.tooltip.condit: UNLOCALIZED: When placed side by side
block.create.brass_tunnel.tooltip.behavi: UNLOCALIZED: _Túneis de Bronze_ connect to each other allowing for content from one _Esteira_ to be redirected to another.

UNLOCALIZED: _Túneis de Bronze_ come with filters for both _Input_ and _Output_. If an _Item_ isn't permitted from the filtered output of a _Tunnel_ it will be transferred to the output of a connected _Tunnel_.
UNLOCALIZED: _Túneis de Bronze_ pode ser configured to change the method in which _Items_ are sorted onto connected _Esteiras_.
block.create.brass_tunnel.tooltip.contro: UNLOCALIZED: R-Click with Chave Inglesa on Side
block.create.brass_tunnel.tooltip.action: UNLOCALIZED: _Adjusts window shutters_ if the tunnel has a window on that face.
block.create.brass_tunnel.tooltip.contro: UNLOCALIZED: Scroll with Chave Inglesa on Top
block.create.brass_tunnel.tooltip.action: UNLOCALIZED: Change the splitting method of connected _Túnels_.
block.create.copper_casing.tooltip.summa: UNLOCALIZED: Robust machine casing with a variety of uses. Safe for decoration.
block.create.copper_casing.tooltip.behav: UNLOCALIZED: _Encases_ the _Encanamento_ with the _Revestimento de Cobre_. Encanamento Revestidos will _lock their connections_ in place, no longer reacting to changes to neighbouring pipes.
UNLOCALIZED: A _Encanamento_ encased with the _Revestimento de Cobre_.
block.create.copper_valve_handle.tooltip: UNLOCALIZED: A precise _source_ of _Rotational Force_ that requires the interaction of players. Be careful not to wear yourself out!
UNLOCALIZED: Provides _Rotational Force_ to an attached contraption. _Sneak to reverse_ the rotation.
block.create.seat.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Sit yourself down and enjoy the ride! Will anchor a player onto a moving _contraption_. Great for static furniture too! Comes in a variety of colours.
block.create.seat.tooltip.behaviour1: UNLOCALIZED: Sits the player on the _Cadeira_. Press L-shift to leave the _Seat_.
block.create.chute.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: _Collect_ and transport items vertically or diagonally. Can both take and place items into _item containers_. You can also interact with chutes from the side using _hoppers_ or _mounted funnels_.
block.create.chute.tooltip.condition1: UNLOCALIZED: When powered by a fan
block.create.chute.tooltip.behaviour1: UNLOCALIZED: _Fan_ powered chutes can convey _Items_ upwards, and suck _items_ off of _Depósitos_ and _Esteiras_.
block.create.depot.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A handy location to place your _Items_. Provides an interaction point for several machines
block.create.depot.tooltip.behaviour1: UNLOCALIZED: Places or takes an _Item_ from the _Depósito_. _Blocos_ and _Engenhocas_ that would interact with a _Esteira_ also work on a _Depósito_.
item.create.blaze_cake.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A Delicious treat for your hard-working _Maçarico de Blazes_. Gets them all fired up!
item.create.empty_blaze_burner.tooltip.s: UNLOCALIZED: A little iron home for your fiery friends. I'm sure you could put them to good use.
item.create.empty_blaze_burner.tooltip.c: UNLOCALIZED: When used on a Blaze or Blaze spawner
item.create.empty_blaze_burner.tooltip.b: UNLOCALIZED: _Captures_ a Blaze in the item
block.create.fluid_pipe.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Used for moving _fluids_ around. Needs a _Bomba Mecânica_ to get the _fluid_ moving.
block.create.fluid_pipe.tooltip.behaviou: UNLOCALIZED: Can connect to _fluid containers_ such as _Tanks_ or _Bacias_. Exposed _pipe_ ends can also drain or place fluid blocks. Be careful of leaks!
block.create.fluid_pipe.tooltip.action1: UNLOCALIZED: Places a window on the pipe if available
block.create.hose_pulley.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Used for _placing_ or _draining_ large _fluid bodies_ in the world.
block.create.hose_pulley.tooltip.behavio: UNLOCALIZED: _Raises_ or _Lowers_ the hose, location of the hose determines up to which _height extraction_ or _filling_ will act.
block.create.hose_pulley.tooltip.conditi: UNLOCALIZED: When Fluids pulled from Pulley
block.create.hose_pulley.tooltip.behavio: UNLOCALIZED: Starts _taking fluid_ blocks from the body the hose end was lowered into. Very _large bodies_ of fluids will be _considered infinite_.
block.create.hose_pulley.tooltip.conditi: UNLOCALIZED: When Fluids pushed to Pulley
block.create.hose_pulley.tooltip.behavio: UNLOCALIZED: Starts _filling fluid_ into the world _up to_ the _hose_ ends' _height_.
block.create.fluid_tank.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: _Stores_ all your favourite _fluids_. Scales in width and height.
block.create.creative_fluid_tank.tooltip: UNLOCALIZED: This _Tanque de Fluidos_ allows infinite replication of any Fluid. Scales in width and height.
UNLOCALIZED: Anything _extracting_ from this tank will provide an _endless supply_ of the fluid specified. Fluids _inserted_ into this tank will be _voided._
block.create.fluid_valve.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Halts the flow of fluid down a pipe.
block.create.fluid_valve.tooltip.behavio: UNLOCALIZED: Applied _rotational force_ will force the _valve_ to close, ceasing the flow of _fluids_. Reverse the direction of the _rotational force_ to re-open the valve.
block.create.mechanical_pump.tooltip.sum: UNLOCALIZED: Takes _rotational force_ and uses it to move _fluid_ along a _pipe_. Has a maximum range of effect in both directions. (16 blocks by default)
block.create.mechanical_pump.tooltip.beh: UNLOCALIZED: Applied _rotational force_ creates pressure that forces _fluid_ through the _pipe_ network. Reverse the direction of the _rotational force_ to switch the direction that the _fluid_ flows.
block.create.mechanical_pump.tooltip.act: UNLOCALIZED: Reverses the direction of the _pump_, switching the default direction of the flow
block.create.smart_fluid_pipe.tooltip.su: UNLOCALIZED: A _fluid pipe_ with a filter. Can specify which _fluids_ pass through.
block.create.smart_fluid_pipe.tooltip.co: UNLOCALIZED: When Fluids are pushed into it
block.create.smart_fluid_pipe.tooltip.be: UNLOCALIZED: Smart pipes receiving fluid that does not match its filter will block the flow.
block.create.smart_fluid_pipe.tooltip.co: UNLOCALIZED: When adjacent to fluid container
block.create.smart_fluid_pipe.tooltip.be: UNLOCALIZED: Smart pipes _starting_ a _flow_ from any container will only extract fluids that _match_ its _filter._
block.create.spout.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: An injector for refilling your _fluid items._
block.create.spout.tooltip.behaviour1: UNLOCALIZED: When a _fluid container item_ such as a _bucket_ or _bottle_ is placed underneath, the spout will attempt to refill it with it's own stored _fluid_.
block.create.spout.tooltip.behaviour2: UNLOCALIZED: The spout placed above a _belt_ or _depot_ will react automatically with a _fluid container item_ that passes beneath it.
block.create.item_drain.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A grated depot for emptying your _fluid items._
block.create.item_drain.tooltip.behaviou: UNLOCALIZED: When a _fluid container item_ such as a _bucket_ or _bottle_ is inserted from the side, the drain will attempt to empty it into its own _fluid container_. The item will then be ejected on the opposite side.
block.create.mechanical_arm.tooltip.beha: UNLOCALIZED: Can take or place items into any _accessible inventory_, such as _Esteiras_, _Depósitos_, _Funils_ and _Fabricador Mecânicos_.
block.create.mechanical_arm.tooltip.acti: UNLOCALIZED: Right-Click an _accessible item inventory_ to set it as a _source_ for the _Braço Mecânico_. Right-click twice to set it as the _destination_.
UNLOCALIZED: Sets the ordering behaviour for _items_ output by the _mechanical Arm_.
item.create.wand_of_symmetry.tooltip.sum: Espelhar perfeitamente a colocação de blocos nos planos configurados.
item.create.handheld_blockzapper.tooltip: Gadget imaginário para colocar ou substituir blocos a distância.
Define os blocos colocados pela ferramenta no bloco de destino.
item.create.handheld_worldshaper.tooltip: UNLOCALIZED: Handy tool for creating _landscapes_ and _terrain features_.
UNLOCALIZED: Sets blocks placed by the tool to the targeted block.
UNLOCALIZED: Applies the currently selected _Brush_ and _Tool_ at the targeted location.
item.create.tree_fertilizer.tooltip.summ: Uma combinação poderosa de minerais para tipos comuns de arvores
item.create.tree_fertilizer.tooltip.beha: Cresce Arvores independentemente das suas Regras de espaço
item.create.deforester.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A _radiant axe_ able to chop down trees in a split second.
item.create.extendo_grip.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Boioioing! Greatly _increases reach distance_ of the wielder.
item.create.extendo_grip.tooltip.behavio: UNLOCALIZED: Increases _reach distance_ of items used in the _Main-Hand_.
item.create.filter.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: _Controls outputs_ and _inputs_ of logistical devices with more _precision_, matching them against a _set of items_ or several _nested filters_.
item.create.filter.tooltip.behaviour1: UNLOCALIZED: _Controls_ item flow according to its _configuration_.
item.create.attribute_filter.tooltip.sum: UNLOCALIZED: _Controls outputs_ and _inputs_ of logistical devices with more _precision_, matching them against a _set of_ item _attributes_ and _categories_.
item.create.attribute_filter.tooltip.beh: UNLOCALIZED: _Controls_ item flow according to its _configuration_.
item.create.empty_schematic.tooltip.summ: Usado como ingrediente em receitas e para escrever na _Mesa_ _de_ _Esquematizar_
item.create.schematic.tooltip.summary: Contem uma estrutura para ser posicionada e colocada no mundo. Posicione o Holograma como desejar e use um _Esquemacannon_ para construí-lo.
item.create.schematic.tooltip.behaviour1: Pode ser posicionado usando as Ferramentas em Tela
item.create.schematic.tooltip.action1: Abre uma _Interface_ para informar as _Coordenadas_ exatas.
Usado para salvar uma Estrutura no mundo para um arquivo .nbt.
Selecione duas coordenadas de extremidade usando B-Direito
_Ctrl-Rolar_ nas faces para ajustar o tamanho. B-Direito de novo para Salvar.
Selecione pontos no _meio_ _do_ _ar_. _Rolar_ para ajustar a distância.
block.create.schematicannon.tooltip.summ: Dispara blocos para recriar um _Esquema_ no Mundo. Usa itens de Inventários adjacentes e _Pólvora_ como combustível.
block.create.schematic_table.tooltip.beh: Importa um Arquivo escolhido da sua Pasta de Esquemas
block.create.cogwheel.tooltip.summary: _Transmite_ _Rotação_ em uma linha reta, e para _Rodas_ _Dentadas_ adjacentes.
block.create.large_cogwheel.tooltip.summ: Uma versão maior da _Roda_ _Dentada,_ permitindo mudança na _Velocidade_ de _Rotação_ quando conectada a sua Contraparte.
block.create.encased_shaft.tooltip.summa: _Transmite_ _Rotação_ em uma linha reta. Apropriada para propagar Rotação através de Muros.
block.create.gearshift.tooltip.summary: Um _disjuntor_ de _rotação_ controlável para eixos conectados.
block.create.clutch.tooltip.summary: Um _disjuntor_ de _rotação_ controlável para os eixos conectados.
block.create.clutch.tooltip.behaviour1: _Para_ de prover rotação para o outro lado.
block.create.encased_chain_drive.tooltip: UNLOCALIZED: _Relays Rotation_ in a straight line and to adjacent _Transmissão por Corrente Revestidos_. Chain drives connect in a group when placed next to another on any face without a shaft. Their orientation does not have to match.
UNLOCALIZED: Attached Blocos will relay _rotation speed_ and direction of this component.
UNLOCALIZED: _Relays Rotation_ in a straight line and to adjacent _Transmissão por Corrente Revestidos_. _Analog redstone_ provided to this block will control which size of drive wheel is engaged with attached chain drives.

UNLOCALIZED: _Without_ a signal, adjacent chain drives will relay the _same speed._ With a _full strength_ signal, adjacent chain drives will relay exactly _twice its speed._ Anything inbetween will give results between 1-2x its speed.
item.create.belt_connector.tooltip.summa: Conecta dois _Eixos_ com uma _Esteira_ _Mecânica._ Eixos conectados irá ter exatamente a mesma velocidade e direção de rotação. A Esteira pode atuar como um _Transporte_ para _Entidades._
item.create.belt_connector.tooltip.actio: Seleciona o eixo como uma polia da Esteira. Os dois Eixos selecionadas precisam estar _alinhados_ seja na _Vertical,_ _Horizontal_ ou _Diagonal_ na direção da Esteira.
_Cancela_ a seleção da Posição para a Esteira
item.create.goggles.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A pair of glasses to augment your vision with useful _kinetic information_.
item.create.goggles.tooltip.behaviour1: UNLOCALIZED: Shows _colored indicators_ corresponding to the _Speed Level_ of a placed kinetic component as well as _Stress Impact_ and _Capacity_ of individual components.
item.create.goggles.tooltip.behaviour2: UNLOCALIZED: Shows detailed information about _Speed_ or _Stress_ of the network to which the gauge is connected.
item.create.wrench.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A useful tool for working on kinetic contraptions. Can be used to _Rotate_, _Dismantle_ and to _Configure_ components.
item.create.wrench.tooltip.action1: UNLOCALIZED: _Rotates components_ toward or away from the face with which you interacted.
item.create.wrench.tooltip.action2: UNLOCALIZED: _Disassembles Kinetic components_ and places them back in _your inventory_.
block.create.creative_motor.tooltip.summ: UNLOCALIZED: A configurable source of _Rotational Force_.
block.create.encased_fan.tooltip.summary: Converte _Força_ _Rotacional_ em _Correntes_ de _Ar_ e vice-versa. Muitos usos.
block.create.encased_fan.tooltip.behavio: _Empurra_ Entidades em um lado, _Puxa_ entidades no outro. Força e Velocidade dependem da Rotação de entrada.
block.create.encased_fan.tooltip.conditi: Quando ar flui através de blocos especiais
block.create.encased_fan.tooltip.behavio: Processa itens na frente do Bloco: _Água_ alva, _Fogo_ defuma, e _Lava_ derrete o ingrediente.
block.create.nozzle.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Attach to the front of an _Revestido Fan_ to distribute its effect on Entities in _all directions_.
block.create.hand_crank.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A simple _source_ of _Rotational Force_ that requires the interaction of players. Be careful not to wear yourself out!
block.create.hand_crank.tooltip.behaviou: UNLOCALIZED: Provides _Rotational Force_ to an attached contraption. _Sneak to reverse_ the rotation.
block.create.cuckoo_clock.tooltip.summar: UNLOCALIZED: Fine craftsmanship for _decorating_ a space and _keeping track of time_.
block.create.cuckoo_clock.tooltip.behavi: UNLOCALIZED: Shows the _current time_ and plays a tune twice a day. _Activates_ once at _noon_ and at dusk, as soon as _players can sleep_.
block.create.turntable.tooltip.summary: Muda a _Força_ _Rotacional_ em uma forma refinada de Enjoo.
block.create.millstone.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A kinetic component suitable for _grinding_ inserted _materials_. Can be powered by an adjacent cogwheel or by connecting to the shaft at the bottom. Results have to be extracted from the component.
block.create.millstone.tooltip.behaviour: UNLOCALIZED: Starts applying _milling recipes_ to any items inserted from the side or the top of the block.
block.create.crushing_wheel.tooltip.summ: Grandes rodas giratórias que _esmagam_ qualquer coisa que impeça seu movimento.
block.create.crushing_wheel.tooltip.cond: Quando conectado a outras Rodas de Moer
block.create.crushing_wheel.tooltip.beha: Forma uma estrutura de esmagamento para processar uma variedade de coisas. Os Dentes da rota precisam estar conectados e se movimentando com a _mesma_ _velocidade_ em _direções_ _opostas._
block.create.mechanical_press.tooltip.su: Um forte pistão usado para comprimir itens abaixo dele. Precisa de _Força_ _Rotacional_ constante
block.create.mechanical_press.tooltip.be: _Inicia_ compressão de itens jogados abaixo dele.
_Automaticamente_ comprime itens que passando na Esteira.
UNLOCALIZED: Starts to _compact items_ in the basin whenever all necessary ingredients are present.
block.create.basin.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A handy _item container_ used in processing with the _Mixer Mecânico_ and the _Prensa Mecânica_. Supports _Redstone Comparators_. Comes with a handy filter, specifying which items should be created in this Bacia.
block.create.basin.tooltip.behaviour1: UNLOCALIZED: When _open inventories_ such as belts, other basins, depots, item drains and others are _below one side_ of a basin, they will automatically receive any _item/fluid outputs_ created in the basin. This is useful for automation.
block.create.blaze_burner.tooltip.summar: UNLOCALIZED: A block to heat a basin when housing a tamed blaze.
block.create.blaze_burner.tooltip.condit: UNLOCALIZED: When placed below a basin
UNLOCALIZED: When fuel is used on the blaze heater
block.create.blaze_burner.tooltip.behavi: UNLOCALIZED: Increases the remaining burn time by the furnace burn time of the used item. Consumes the item. Use _Bolo de Blaze_ for high temperatures.
block.create.reinforced_rail.tooltip.sum: UNLOCALIZED: A timber stabilized rail, _does not need supports_.
block.create.mechanical_mixer.tooltip.su: UNLOCALIZED: A kinetic whisk providing automated shapeless crafting recipes of multiple ingredients. Requires constant _Rotational Force_ and a _Bacia_ placed below (with a gap in between).
block.create.mechanical_mixer.tooltip.be: UNLOCALIZED: Starts to mix items in the basin whenever all necessary ingredients are present. To prevent unwanted recipes, use the filter slot on the basin or cut the rotational force until all desired ingredients have been added.
UNLOCALIZED: A kinetic assembler for _automating_ any _shaped crafting_ recipe. Place _multiple in a grid_ corresponding to your recipe, and _arrange their belts_ to create a _flow_ that exits the grid on one of the crafters.
UNLOCALIZED: _Starts the crafting process_ as soon as _all crafters_ in the grid have been _given an item_.
UNLOCALIZED: _Forces_ the start of the _crafting process_ with all currently given _items_ in the grid.
UNLOCALIZED: When Chave Inglesaed at Front

UNLOCALIZED: _Cycles the direction_ an individual crafter _moves its items_ towards. To form a working grid, _arrange the belts in a flow_ which moves all items towards a final crafter.  The final crafter must _point away_ from the grid.
UNLOCALIZED: When Chave Inglesaed at back
UNLOCALIZED: _Connects_ the _input inventory_ of adjacent crafters. Use this to _combine slots_ in the crafting grid and _save on input work_.
block.create.furnace_engine.tooltip.summ: UNLOCALIZED: A powerful source of _Rotational Power_ that requires a _running furnace_ to work.
block.create.furnace_engine.tooltip.cond: UNLOCALIZED: When Attached to Lit Furnace
block.create.furnace_engine.tooltip.beha: UNLOCALIZED: _Starts powering_ a _Volante_ placed in front of it (1m apart). Use a Alto-forno for higher speeds.
block.create.flywheel.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A large metal wheel to _harness and stabilize_ generated force by an _attached Engine_. Volantes connect to engines if they are _1m apart_ and at a _90° Angle_ from each other.
block.create.flywheel.tooltip.condition1: UNLOCALIZED: When Attached to Running Engine
block.create.flywheel.tooltip.behaviour1: UNLOCALIZED: Provides _Rotational Force_ to a connected contraption based on the generator's strength and speed.
UNLOCALIZED: A portable interchange point for _moving items_ to and from a _structure_ moved by a piston, bearing, minecart, or pulley. Two meeting interfaces have to _face each other_ and be spaced _1-2 blocks apart_.

UNLOCALIZED: Interacts with stationary _portable storage interfaces_ to transfer items to or from the contraption. Components inserting into or extracting from the _Stationary Interface_ will interact with the inventories on the contraption _directly._ The structure will briefly stall as items are exchanged.
block.create.portable_fluid_interface.to: UNLOCALIZED: A portable interchange point for _moving fluids_ to and from a _structure_ moved by a piston, bearing, minecart, or pulley. Two meeting interfaces have to _face each other_ and be spaced _1-2 blocks apart_.

UNLOCALIZED: Interacts with stationary _portable storage interfaces_ to transfer fluids to or from the contraption. Pipes inserting into or extracting from the _Stationary Interface_ will interact with the tanks on the contraption _directly._ The structure will briefly stall as Fluids are exchanged.
block.create.rotation_speed_controller.t: UNLOCALIZED: A _configurable relay_ able to speed up or slow down the target component to any desired speed.
UNLOCALIZED: When Attached to Large Cogwheel
UNLOCALIZED: Relays incoming rotational force to the wheel, trying to _match_ the _speed_ it is configured to target. The _cogwheel_ has to be _attached on top_ of the controller.
block.create.mechanical_piston.tooltip.s: Uma verão melhorada do _Pistão,_ usando _Força_ _Rotacional_ para mover estruturas de forma precisa. _Varas_ de _Extensão_ do _Pistão_ na traseira definem o _Alcance_ deste Dispositivo. Sem extensões o pistão não se move. Use __Chassis_ de _Translado_ para mover mais de uma linha de blocos.
block.create.mechanical_piston.tooltip.b: Começa a mover blocos presos na estrutura. Velocidade e direção diretamente relacionados a Velocidade Rotação de entrada.
block.create.piston_extension_pole.toolt: Quando preso a um Pistão Mecânico
Aumenta a extensão dos pistões em 1 bloco
Usado para rotacionar _estruturas_ _grandes_ ou geração de _Força_ _Rotacional_ do vento.
Começa a rotacionar _Chassis_ de _Rotação_ conectados e blocos conectados a eles.
block.create.windmill_bearing.tooltip.su: UNLOCALIZED: Used for harnessing _Rotational Force_ from wind. Attach your own design and watch it spin!
block.create.windmill_bearing.tooltip.be: UNLOCALIZED: Starts providing _Rotational Force_ generated from the rotation of its attached structure. The Structure has to include suitable _Velas Blocos_ or _Wool_. Use _Chassis_, _Slime_ or _Super Cola_ to move more than a single block.
block.create.sail_frame.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A useful building block and source of kinetic energy when part of a structure mounted onto a _Rolamento de Moinho de Vento_.
block.create.white_sail.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A useful building block and source of kinetic energy when part of a structure mounted onto a _Rolamento de Moinho de Vento_. Comes in a variety of colours.
block.create.white_sail.tooltip.behaviou: UNLOCALIZED: Changes color of the velas.
block.create.clockwork_bearing.tooltip.s: UNLOCALIZED: An advanced version of the _Mechanical Bearing_ for rotating up to two _clock hands_ according to current _in-game time_.
block.create.clockwork_bearing.tooltip.b: UNLOCALIZED: Starts rotating the attached Structure towards the _current hour_. If an independent second structure exists in front of the first one, it will serve as the _minute hand_.
block.create.sequenced_gearshift.tooltip: UNLOCALIZED: A _programmable utility component,_ which can change its _rotational through-put_ according to up to _5 consecutive instructions._ Use this to power Mechanical Bearings, Pistons or Pulleys with more control over timing and speed. May become less precise at higher speeds.
UNLOCALIZED: _Starts executing_ programmed instructions based on the input speed.
block.create.cart_assembler.tooltip.summ: UNLOCALIZED: When placed on a _Trilho_, can _assemble_ and _disassemble_ moving structures onto passing minecarts. Refer to [Ctrl] for rail type specific behaviour.
block.create.cart_assembler.tooltip.beha: UNLOCALIZED: With a _single_ assember, structures will anchor and rotate on a _single minecart_. Use a _wrench_ to specify desired _rotation behaviour_.

UNLOCALIZED: Two cart assembers _connected by_ a _structure_ will, once both contain a minecart, connect those carts with a _contraption mounted between_ the _two_ of them. The structure will behave similarly to a _Carrinho de mina Coupling_.
block.create.cart_assembler.tooltip.acti: UNLOCALIZED: _Assembles_ onto passing carts _when powered_, _disassembles_ them otherwise.
block.create.cart_assembler.tooltip.cont: UNLOCALIZED: When placed above Powered Trilho
block.create.cart_assembler.tooltip.acti: UNLOCALIZED: Assembles and _accelerates_ carts _when powered_, disassembles and _holds_ them otherwise.
block.create.cart_assembler.tooltip.cont: UNLOCALIZED: When placed above Detector Trilho
UNLOCALIZED: When placed above Activator Trilho
block.create.rope_pulley.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Moves attached _blocks_ and _structures vertically_. Use _Chassis_, _Slime_ or _Super Cola_ to move more than a single block.
block.create.rope_pulley.tooltip.behavio: UNLOCALIZED: Starts moving the attached structure. Speed and direction correlate to the incoming Rotation Speed.
block.create.linear_chassis.tooltip.summ: Uma base configurável para Estruturas serem movidas por um _Pistão_ _Mecânico._ Esses Blocos precisam formas uma camada de blocos na frente do Pistão.
block.create.linear_chassis.tooltip.beha: _Move_ todos os _Chassis_ _conectados_ na mesma orientação, e Blocos conectados a frente dele. Quando o Pistão volta, blocos apenas serão puxados se a face do chassis for _Grudenta_ (Ver [Ctrl]).
UNLOCALIZED: Configure the _range_ for this chassis block. Hold CTRL to modify the range of all attached chassis blocks as well.
block.create.linear_chassis.tooltip.cont: Quando clicado com B-Direito com Gosma de Slime
block.create.linear_chassis.tooltip.acti: Torna a face clicada _Grudenta._ Quando o pistão volta, o chassis irá _puxar_ _junto_ todos os Blocos conectados na sua coluna e no Alcance configurado.
block.create.secondary_linear_chassis.to: UNLOCALIZED: A second type of _Linear Chassis_ that does not connect to the other.
block.create.radial_chassis.tooltip.summ: Nessário para rotacionar estruturas om um _Rolamento_ _Mecânico._
block.create.radial_chassis.tooltip.beha: _Rotaciona_ todos os blocos conectados a lados _Grudentos_ (Veja [Ctrl]) dentro do alcance configurado no seu entorno. _Propaga_ a rotação para outros Chassis de Rotação conectados.
UNLOCALIZED: Configure the _range_ for this chassis block. Hold CTRL to modify the range of all attached chassis blocks as well.
block.create.radial_chassis.tooltip.cont: Quando clicado com B-Direito com Goma de Slime
block.create.radial_chassis.tooltip.acti: Torna face clicada em _Grudenta._ Quando o Chassis girar, todos os blocos conectados nesse lado irão girar junto.
block.create.mechanical_drill.tooltip.be: Atua como um Bloco Quebrador _estacionário._ Também _machuca_ _entidades_ na sua área de efeito.
Quebra os Blocos na direção do avanço da broca.
block.create.mechanical_harvester.toolti: Um cortador de plantas mecânico indicado para automação de culturas de médio porte
_Colhe_ todas as _safra_ _madura_ que a lâmina passar sobre, e os retorna a estado de crescimento inicial.
block.create.mechanical_plough.tooltip.s: UNLOCALIZED: A mechanical plough has a variety of uses. It is movable with _Mechanical Pistons_, _Bearings_ or other controllers.
block.create.mechanical_plough.tooltip.b: UNLOCALIZED: _Breaks blocks_ which _não pode ser collided_ with, such as torches, tracks or snow layers. _Applies_ its _motion_ to _entities_ without hurting them. _Tills soil blocks_ as though a Hoe would be used on them.
block.create.mechanical_saw.tooltip.summ: UNLOCALIZED: Suitable for _cutting trees_ effectively and for _cutting blocks_ into their carpentered counterparts. It is movable using _Mechanical Pistons_ or _Bearings_.
block.create.mechanical_saw.tooltip.beha: UNLOCALIZED: Applies _Sawing_ and _Stonecutting Recipes_ to items dropped onto or inserted into it. When multiple outputs are possible, it cycles through them unless a _filter_ is assigned.
UNLOCALIZED: _Breaks logs_ in front of it. If the log supported a tree on its own, the _tree will collapse_ away from the saw.
UNLOCALIZED: _Cuts_ all _Trees_ with which the saw collides.
block.create.stockpile_switch.tooltip.su: Alterna um sinal de Redstone com base no _Espaço_ de _Armazenamento_ do Reciente conectado.
block.create.content_observer.tooltip.su: UNLOCALIZED: _Detects Items_ inside _containers_ and _conveyors_ matching a configured _filter_. While the observed _inventory_, _belt_ or _chute contains_ a matching item, this component will emit a _Redstone Signal_. When an observed _funnel transfers_ a matching item, this component will emit a _Redstone Pulse_.
block.create.redstone_link.tooltip.summa: Saida para conexões _Redstone_ _Sem-Fio._ Pode ter _Frequências_ usando qualquer item. Distancia do Sinal é limitada, mas resoavelmente justa.
block.create.redstone_link.tooltip.behav: Recebendo Conexões da mesma _Frequência_ irá gerar um sinal de Redstone.
block.create.redstone_link.tooltip.contr: Quando clicado com B-Direito com um Item
block.create.redstone_link.tooltip.actio: Altera a _Frequência_ para aquele item. Até _dois_ _itens_ _diferentes_ podem ser combinados para definir uma Frequência.
block.create.redstone_link.tooltip.contr: Quando clicado com B-Direito enquanto Abaixado
block.create.nixie_tube.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A fancy redstone-powered _Number_ and _Text Display_.
block.create.nixie_tube.tooltip.behaviou: UNLOCALIZED: Shows the current redstone _Signal Strength_ as its displayed value.
UNLOCALIZED: Display _contents_ of your _name tag_ with several nixie tubes _arranged_ in a _line_.
block.create.redstone_contact.tooltip.su: Um dispositivo simples para Mecanimos de Redstone avançados.
block.create.redstone_contact.tooltip.be: Ativa todos os Contatos imóveis na passagem
block.create.adjustable_crate.tooltip.su: Este _Recipiente_ de _Armazenamento_ permite controle Manual da sua capacidade. Pode conter até _16_ _Pilhas_ de qualquer Item
block.create.creative_crate.tooltip.summ: Provê um suprimento infinito de blocos para _Esquemacannons_ próximos
block.create.creative_crate.tooltip.cond: UNLOCALIZED: When Item in Filter Slot
block.create.creative_crate.tooltip.beha: UNLOCALIZED: Anything _extracting_ from this container will provide an _endless supply_ of the item specified. Items _inserted_ into this crate will be _voided._
block.create.deployer.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: _Punches_, _Uses_, and _Activates_. This machine will try to _imitate_ a _player_ as a much as possible. Can _Take_ and _Deposit items_ to its own _Inventory_. Held items have to be _inserted_ and _extracted_ from the block directly.
block.create.deployer.tooltip.behaviour1: UNLOCALIZED: Extends its arm and _activates_ in the block space _2m ahead_ of itself.
block.create.deployer.tooltip.behaviour2: UNLOCALIZED: Toggles punch mode. In _punch mode_, the Deployer will attempt to use its item to _break blocks_ or _hurt entities_.
block.create.deployer.tooltip.behaviour3: UNLOCALIZED: Deployer will not activate unless held item _matches_ the _filter._ Items not matching não pode ser inserted; Held items matching the filter não pode ser extracted.
block.create.brass_casing.tooltip.summar: UNLOCALIZED: Sturdy machine casing with a variety of uses. Safe for decoration. Can be used to _encase Eixos_ and _Esteira Mecânicas._
block.create.pulse_repeater.tooltip.summ: Um circuito simples para cortar pulsos de Redstone até um comprimento de _1_ _tick._
block.create.adjustable_repeater.tooltip: Um um _Repetidor_ de _Redstone_ avançado com um _Delay_ _configurável_ de até 30 Minutos.
block.create.adjustable_pulse_repeater.t: UNLOCALIZED: A _Pulse Repeater_ with a _configurable Delay_ up to 30 Minutes.
block.create.analog_lever.tooltip.summar: UNLOCALIZED: A lever with more _precise control_ over its emitted _signal strength_.
block.create.powered_toggle_latch.toolti: UNLOCALIZED: A lever that pode ser toggled by a _Redstone Pulse_.
block.create.powered_latch.tooltip.summa: UNLOCALIZED: A lever that pode ser controlled by _Redstone Signals_. A signal on the _back enables_ it, a signal from the _side will reset_ it.
block.create.controller_rail.tooltip.sum: UNLOCALIZED: A _uni-directional powered rail_ capable of _fine control_ over a minecarts' _movement speed_.
block.create.controller_rail.tooltip.beh: UNLOCALIZED: _Accelerates_ or _Decelerates_ passing _minecarts_ corresponding to the _signal strength_. Propagates redstone power to adjacent controller rails. Powering two controller rails with different strengths will cause tracks between them to interpolate their signal.
block.create.speedometer.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Measures and displays the _rotational speed_ of attached kinetic components. Supports _Redstone Comparators_.
block.create.speedometer.tooltip.behavio: UNLOCALIZED: Indicates a color corresponding to the level of speed. _Green_ indicates Slow, _Azul_ Moderate and _Purple_ Fast rotation. Some mechanical components require a sufficient level of speed to work properly.
block.create.stressometer.tooltip.summar: UNLOCALIZED: Measures and displays the _overall stress_ of the attached kinetic network. Supports _Redstone Comparators_.
block.create.stressometer.tooltip.behavi: UNLOCALIZED: Indicates a color corresponding to the level of stress. _Over-stressed networks_ will cease to move. Stress pode ser relieved by adding more _rotational sources_ to the network.
item.create.sand_paper.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A rough paper that pode ser used to _polish materials_. Can be automatically applied using the Deployer.
item.create.sand_paper.tooltip.behaviour: UNLOCALIZED: Applies polish to items held in the _offhand_ or lying on the _floor_ when _looking at them_
item.create.super_glue.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: Glue a block to another, and they will forever be inseparable.
item.create.super_glue.tooltip.behaviour: UNLOCALIZED: Makes the _clicked face_ of a block _sticky_. Blocos attached to sticky faces will be _dragged along_ when moved by _mechanical pistons_, _bearings_ and other controllers.
UNLOCALIZED: _Automatically attaches_ blocks placed from the main hand to the _side_ they were _placed against._
item.create.builders_tea.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: The perfect drink to get the day started- _Motivating_ and _Saturating._
item.create.refined_radiance.tooltip.sum: UNLOCALIZED: A Cromático material forged from _absorbed light_.
item.create.shadow_steel.tooltip.summary: UNLOCALIZED: A Cromático material forged _in the void_.
item.create.minecart_coupling.tooltip.su: UNLOCALIZED: _Chains_ all your _Carrinhos de mina_ or _Carriage Engenhocas_ together to form a majestic Train.
item.create.minecart_coupling.tooltip.co: UNLOCALIZED: When Used on Carrinho de mina
item.create.minecart_coupling.tooltip.be: UNLOCALIZED: _Couples_ two Carrinhos de mina together, attempting to keep them at a _constant distance_ while moving.
item.create.crafter_slot_cover.tooltip.s: UNLOCALIZED: Used to mark a _Fabricador Mecânico_ as an empty slot in a recipe. Fabricadors do not necessarily have to form a full square grid. This is useful when there are recipes where _ingredients are diagonal_ to each other.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription0: UNLOCALIZED: Please keep this item away from children.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription1: UNLOCALIZED: A baby panda dies every time you use this item. Every. Time.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription2: UNLOCALIZED: Use at your own risk.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription3: UNLOCALIZED: This is not the item you are looking for, *finger-wiggles* please disperse.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription4: UNLOCALIZED: This item will self-destruct in 10 seconds. 10, 9, 8...
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription6: UNLOCALIZED: By using this item, you hereby consent to our disclaimer and agree to its terms.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription7: UNLOCALIZED: This one maybe isn't for you. What about that one?
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription8: UNLOCALIZED: Use it and regret your decision immediately.
